channel.title: What happened
channel.description:
What happened to just sources and no clients? Can anyone point me in the direction to a server that you don't need a client to play. I want to be able to play it through moparscape (so obv no customs)
It may be a nooby question but does this still exist?

item.title: What happened
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“leaderofel, post:1, topic:469341”]What happened to just sources and no clients? Can anyone point me in the direction to a server that you don’t need a client to play. I want to be able to play it through moparscape (so obv no customs)

It may be a nooby question but does this still exist?[/quote]

I know that most delta based servers are compatible with the MoparScape client, I’m not sure about the rest of frameworks. winterLove will be compatible.

Read full topic
